summary: Exploring the intersections of technology, design, and global internet experiences, this overview encapsulates the fragmented yet innovative landscape of the digital world. Articles discuss internet fragmentation inspired by tectonic shifts and the disparity in global internet usage while proposing sustainable, inclusive digital ecosystems. The profiles highlight leaders in tech and design, aiming to foster interdisciplinary innovation for a dynamic digital future.
excerpt: Fragmentation of the internet mirrors Earth's tectonic shifts and exploitative tech practices. Embracing fragmented systems, 'ecosystem architecture' aims for creating vibrant, sustainable digital ecosystems.
